name: key-presser-macro
description: A powerful keyboard macro application built with Electron and Next.js
author: Antigravity

scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently -k "next dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "try { $p = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -First 1; if ($p) { Stop-Process -Id $p -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } catch {}; Get-Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -match 'electron' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if (Test-Path '.next/dev/lock') { Remove-Item '.next/dev/lock' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }"
